DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate pharmacokinetic parameter antioxidative effect Thai healthy men .
DOC.criteria: Thai healthy male female age 1845 year old BMI 1825 kg/m2 Normal medical history , physical examination vital sign Normal screen laboratory history drug allergies Willingness take part study provide inform consent History GI , liver , kidney , allergic disease disease may interfere bioavailability lime powder regimen History alcohol drug abuse Heavy smoking Receive medication within 14 day prior study day
